com.robopupu.api.mvp

Interface ViewListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FeaturePresenter, Presenter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFeaturePresenter, AbstractPresenter

    public interface ViewListener
    ViewListener a listener interface for receiving lifecycle events from a View. This interface is mainly intended to be used by an attached Presenter.

    • Method Summary
